statements: SELECT * FROM game_session;
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_id, start_time, end_time, duration, score, level FROM game_session;
SELECT player_id, score FROM game_session WHERE score > 100;
SELECT * FROM game_session ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) FROM game_session GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM game_session WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, start_time, end_time, duration FROM game_session WHERE level = 3 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM game_session GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM game_session WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY player_id HAVING SUM(score) > 500;
SELECT player_id, AVG(score) AS average_score, COUNT(*) AS total_sessions FROM game_session WHERE level >= 5 GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_sessions DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_session_data WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, score FROM player_session_data ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT game_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM player_session_data GROUP BY game_id;
SELECT AVG(average_score) AS avg_score, MAX(total_play_time) AS max_play_time FROM game_performance_data;
SELECT * FROM game_performance_data WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT player_id, game_id, session_id, play_time, score FROM player_session_data WHERE player_id = 1 AND game_id = 3 ORDER BY play_time DESC
SELECT player_id, game_id, session_id, play_time, score FROM player_session_data WHERE game_id IN (2, 4, 6) AND score > 100 ORDER BY game_id ASC, score DESC
SELECT game_id, average_score, total_sessions FROM game_performance_data WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY average_score DESC, total_sessions DESC
SELECT game_id, total_sessions, total_play_time FROM game_performance_data WHERE total_play_time > INTERVAL '5 hours' ORDER BY total_sessions ASC, total_play_time DESC
SELECT player_id, game_id, session_id, play_time, score FROM player_session_data WHERE player_id = 3 OR game_id = 5 ORDER BY score DESC, play_time ASC
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_details WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level, join_date FROM player_details WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_id, duration, score FROM game_performance WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT player_id, game_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level, join_date FROM player_details WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_id, score, duration FROM game_performance WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_id, score, duration FROM game_performance ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameSessions;
SELECT player_id, session_start, session_end FROM GameSessions ORDER BY session_start DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM PlayerInfo WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT session_id, game_id, actions_taken FROM GameAnalytics WHERE session_id = 1001;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM GameEvents ORDER BY event_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM GameSessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM PlayerInfo WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_id FROM GameAnalytics ORDER BY session_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameEvents WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_name, player_level, join_date FROM PlayerInfo ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM games;
SELECT game_name, genre, release_year FROM games WHERE genre='RPG';
SELECT player_name, age, country FROM players WHERE age > 18;
SELECT game_name, release_year, platform FROM games ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT player_name, action_type, action_time FROM players JOIN player_actions ON players.player_id = player_actions.player_id;
SELECT game_name, genre, release_year FROM games WHERE release_year > 2010 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT player_name, age, country, email FROM players WHERE country = 'USA' OR country = 'Canada';
SELECT game_name, platform, genre FROM games JOIN players ON games.game_id = players.player_id WHERE players.age > 18;
SELECT player_name, score, duration FROM players JOIN performance_metrics ON players.player_id = performance_metrics.player_id WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;

SELECT game_name, player_name, start_time, end_time FROM games JOIN game_sessions ON games.game_id = game_sessions.game_id JOIN players ON game_sessions.player_id = players.player_id ORDER BY start_time DESC;
